overview: Isi is a 50-year-old gay "young man" tired of his perpetual adolescence. Everything takes an unexpected turn when his elderly mother falls ill and Isi must return to the family home to take care of her. Desperate, he discovers that there is only one way to get his mother to eat and take her medicine...to read her his favorite novel, "Gone with the Wind".
title: A Dios pongo por testigo
